p:
The entry points of coronaviruses are known. and Jia et al. found that infection of human airway epithelia with SARS coronavirus correlated with ACE2 expression.
12 It has also been shown that ACE2 endocytosis is dependent upon AT1R.
7
,
13 The new SARS-CoV-2 also uses ACE2 to enter the cell
14 and relies on ‘priming’ by the serine protease transmembrane protease, serine 2 (TMPRSS2).
15
,
16
